flavor_text: バトル開始から数えて3の倍数のターン開始時、味方生存者全体の腕力、体力、器用さ、素早さ、知力、精神、愛、魅力の能力ダウン状態を解除する
flavor_text_en: At the start of a turn that is a multiple of 3 counting from the start of the battle, unlock the strength, health, dexterity, quickness, intelligence, spirit, love, and charm of all allied survivors
name: 3の倍数のターン開始時 能力ダウン解除
name_en: Unlock ability reduction at the start of a turn that is a multiple of 3

flavor_text:
ターン終了時、自身のHPを回復する( 効果極小 )
バトル開始から数えて奇数ターン目の開始時、自身のBPを回復する( +2 )
バトル開始から数えて偶数ターン目の開始時、自身の腕力・体力・精神を上昇させる( 効果中 )
flavor_text_en:
At the end of a turn, recover your own HP (minimal effect)

At the start of an odd-numbered turn counting from the start of the battle, recover your own BP (+2) at the start of an even-numbered turn counting from the start of the battle Increases one's own strength, physical strength, and spirit (in effect)
name: エレメントヒールⅡ(腕力・体力・精神)

flavor_text: バトル開始から数えて偶数ターン目の開始時、自身の腕力・体力・精神を上昇させる( 効果中 )
flavor_text_en: Increases your strength, health, and spirit at the start of an even-numbered turn counting from the start of the battle (in effect)
name: 偶数ターン開始時 腕力・体力・精神アップ
name_en: Strength, strength, and spirit increase at the start of an even-numbered turn

flavor_text:
自身の全ての攻撃が[特効：人間、植物]になる
Critical攻撃の与ダメージが上昇する( 効果特大 )
flavor_text_en: Damage dealt by critical attacks where all of your attacks become [special effect: human, plant] is increased (extra effective)

When attacked, damage dealt by critical

flavor_text:
自身の全ての攻撃が[特効：人間、男性、女性、巨人]になる
さらに、人間または男性または女性または巨人の敵への攻撃時　敵に与えるダメージが42%上昇する
flavor_text_en:
All of your attacks become [Special: Human, Male, Female, Giant]
, and increases damage dealt to enemies by 42% when attacking a human or male or female or giant enemy
name: 種族特効+(人間/男性/女性/巨人)
simple_flavor_text: 種族特効+ 42%(人間/男性/女性/巨人)

flavor_text:
自身の全ての攻撃が[特効：メカ、岩石]になる
さらに、メカまたは岩石の敵への攻撃時　敵に与えるダメージが42%上昇する
flavor_text_en:
All of your attacks become [Special: Mech, Rock
], and damage dealt to Mech or Rock enemies is increased by 42%
name: 種族特効+(メカ/岩石)

flavor_text:
自身の全ての攻撃が[特効：獣人、獣]になる
さらに、獣人または獣の敵への攻撃時　敵に与えるダメージが42%上昇する
flavor_text_en:
All of your attacks become [Special
Effect: Beast, Beast]. Also increases damage dealt to Beastman or Beast enemies by 42%
name: 種族特効+(獣人/獣)

flavor_text:
自身の全ての攻撃が[特効：竜、爬虫類]になる
さらに、竜または爬虫類の敵への攻撃時　敵に与えるダメージが42%上昇する
flavor_text_en:
All of your attacks become [Special: Dragons, Reptiles] and
increases damage dealt to enemies by 42% when attacking dragon or reptile enemies
name: 種族特効+(竜/爬虫類)

flavor_text:
自身の全ての攻撃が[特効：植物、虫]になる
さらに、植物または虫の敵への攻撃時　敵に与えるダメージが42%上昇する
flavor_text_en:
All of your attacks become [Special
Effect: Plants, Bugs] and increases damage dealt to enemies by 42% when attacking a Plant or Bug enemy
name: 種族特効+(植物/虫)

flavor_text:
自身の全ての攻撃が[特効：水棲、魚、両棲類、カエル]になる
さらに、水棲または魚または両棲類またはカエルの敵への攻撃時　敵に与えるダメージが42%上昇する
flavor_text_en:
All of your attacks become [Special: Aquatic, Fish, Amphibian, Frog]
, and damage dealt to enemies when attacking aquatic or fish or amphibians or frogs is increased by 42%
name: 種族特効+(水棲/魚/両棲類/カエル)
simple_flavor_text: 種族特効+ 42%(水棲/魚/両棲類/カエル)

flavor_text:
自身の全ての攻撃が[特効：不死、骨、悪魔]になる
さらに、不死または骨または悪魔の敵への攻撃時　敵に与えるダメージが42%上昇する
flavor_text_en:
All of your attacks become [Special: Immortal, Bone, Demon], and
when attacking an immortal, bone, or demon enemy, the damage dealt to the enemy is increased by 42%
name: 種族特効+(不死/骨/悪魔)

flavor_text:
自身の全ての攻撃が[特効：火精、水精、風精、土精]になる
さらに、火精または水精または風精または土精の敵への攻撃時　敵に与えるダメージが42%上昇する
flavor_text_en:
All of your attacks become [Special: Fire, Water, Wind, Earth]
, and when attacking an enemy with Fire or Water or Wind or Earth, the damage dealt to the enemy is increased by 42%
name: 種族特効+(火精/水精/風精/土精)
name_en: Species Special Effects+ (Fire, Water, Wind, Earth)
simple_flavor_text: 種族特効+ 42%(火精/水精/風精/土精)
simple_flavor_text_en: Tribal Special Effects + 42% (Fire, Water, Wind, Earth)

味方生存者全体のHPをごく少量回復する
ただし、味方生存者全体の斬攻撃のダメージが5%低下する
flavor_text_en:
Restores a very small amount of HP to all allied survivors at the start of battle;
however, slash attack damage for all allied survivors is reduced by 5%
name: HPごく少量回復(味方全体)<斬攻撃->
name_en: Recover a very small amount of HP (all allies) <斬攻撃->
